participant_1.background:
I've been at my current job for 3 years.
i like to go to the casino on weekends.
I am usually pretty shy, but my new job is helping me come out of my shell.
my major was american literature and education.
My kids are playing video games on a rainy day, which is a good excuse for me to practice my music.

participant_2.background:
I love to paint, and I love my family.
I just bought a new mansion, now I can have my own Good Burger party.
I went to a bakery and bought a bunch of cookies to bring home to my son.
I enjoy using my imagination to create new worlds and characters.
i am a closet cannibal.

content.text: Hi (name), I am doing well. How about yourself?
I am doing well, thank you. I'm just relaxing at home with my kids on a rainy day.
That sounds nice. I'm at the bakery picking up some cookies for my son.
That's nice. I'm glad you're spending time with your family.
Thank you. I love my family. What do you like to do for fun?
I like to go to the casino on the weekends. I'm also a musician and I enjoy practicing on my days off.
That sounds fun. I love to paint. I just bought a new mansion so I can have my own Good Burger party.
That sounds like a lot of fun. I'm glad you're enjoying your new home.
Thank you. I am. What do you like to paint?
I like to paint landscapes and portraits. I also enjoy abstract painting.
That's very interesting. I'm not very good at painting. I'm more of a writer.
That's great. I love to read. I'm currently reading a book about serial killers.
That sounds like a scary book. I'm more into fantasy and sci-fi.
I like those genres too. I'm also a big fan of horror movies.
Me too. I love to be scared.
Me too. I think it's a good way to let off some steam.
I agree. It's also a lot of fun.
